Contact Us

We offer free estimates

Give us a call at 770-461-5379

Thank you for visiting the Mills Tree Experts website. We're located in Fayetteville, GA and serve the surrounding area. We offer an array of tree services, including tree trimming, removal and stump grinding.

Services

Get A Proper Assessment Of Your Tree's Health

A damaged tree doesn't always need to be removed. We'll assess the condition before making recommendations about proper care. In some cases, we can remove branches to promote new growth. Trimming trees can let more light into your landscape and help your other plants flourish.

Schedule a tree assessment by contacting Mills Tree Experts today.

We Have The Equipment To Climb Your Trees

Got a hard to get to tree. No promblem, we climb and repel down trees to reach the branches that require professional attention. We take care to protect your property while removing limbs or entire trees.Mills Tree Experts is licensed, bonded and insured. We accept cash and check payments.

Call 770-461-5379 today for reliable tree services in the Fayetteville, Georgia area.
